metadata.synopsis: Party Banter for Laezel and SH in Moonrise general

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: I itch to draw my weapon and gut every last one of these cultists.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: You're keen. Just don't get carried away - some of those guts might be of more use to us unspilled, at least for a while.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: I know better than to indulge every craving, Shadowheart. But when the time is right, the Absolutists will feel the sting of my blade.
